name: Taxicab
body:
Taxicab App

The Taxicab app will broadcast your current GPS location / street address to nearby taxicab drivers who are also using the app.

Android Source Code:
.zip: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/79245586/GetTaxi.zip
.rar: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/79245586/GetTaxi.rar

PHP Web API:
.zip: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/79245586/taxi.zip
.rar: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/79245586/taxi.rar

Video:

Android walkthrough:
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/79245586/androidwalkthrough.wmv

Web API updating:
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/79245586/webapiworking.wmv


Concluding Remarks:
- Server API and Android base code is pretty much done. The taxicab app interacts with a webserver to located passengers and drivers within a given radius. There are a lot of possible improvements such as it making it work in real-time and also displaying google maps when user waits for taxi to arrive.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
